DIA_Farmer_HoldwigFinish_Cutscene_03_01: Good for him! He shouldn't mess with us!
DIA_Farmer_HoldwigFinish_Cutscene_03_02: He should stay in his warm home!
DIA_Farmer_HoldwigFinish_Cutscene_03_03: We need to give him a good shaking to make him remember us better!
DIA_Holdwig_HoldwigFinish_Cutscene_03_05: You were my brother, but you stood against me... may Innos forgive you.
